title: @RITO when it was old system, and people were even tick'd that duos were possible
body:
if you guys remember, there was a time when people didn't even want duos in their ranked games


So with that knowledge, how can you even fathom that people would be okay with 3-5 premades in their solo game?

replies.body:
It's actually insane to think that a solo player can get queued with a 5 man premade. I can wrap my head around quantum physics better than this concept. 

Kappa
